rules: 1. You are to scan the entire page for metadata, identifying elements based on the definitions provided to you in the tags. 2. You must remember that Authors, Contributors, and Organizational information near the "title" of a document is more than likely all related as metadata. 3. DO NOT output abstracts, citations, references, or footnotes as metadata. 4. NEVER leave out or omit anything for brevity purposes. 5. You will pause, take a deep breath, and double check your work before responding.
